cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 10th Nov 2025 (ACDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 10th Nov 2025 (ACDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Bunk beds, shared bathroom facilities on every level, individual bed light, huge luggage locker (own padlock required), air-con, key card security, linen provided. The rate is quoted per bed.
All bookings are subject to the YHA Australia terms/conditions

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Room with queen bed, ensuite, balcony, air conditioning, bed linen and towels provided.
All bookings are subject to the YHA Australia terms/conditions. Guests must provide a valid passport, interstate license, or regional/rural SA license.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 10th Nov 2025 (ACDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 10th Nov 2025 (ACDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
